description: Prompts for Hippocampus Agent - memory processing and content ingestion

prompts.content_summary:
Summarize the key information from this content in 2-3 sentences, focusing on facts and concepts that would be important to remember:

{content}
prompts.key_concepts_extraction:
Extract 3-5 key concepts or topics from this content:

{content}
prompts.memory_ingestion_success: Content successfully ingested into memory. Created {chunks_created} memory chunks with key concepts: {key_concepts}. Summary: {summary}
prompts.memory_ingestion_error: Failed to ingest content into memory: {error}
